title: Enhancing Business Practical Competencies: Engagement Profile Analysis and Improvement Strategies in Medical Diagnostic Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and describe four engagement profiles (cognitive/behavioral/non-engagement, etc.).
Learners can diagnose their engagement level using survey and log data.
Learners can propose three or more strategies to enhance goal orientation (mastery approach) and self-efficacy.
Learners can achieve 85% or higher diagnostic accuracy in virtual patient simulations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
